name: Protocol Endfall
description:
Albert Aardt is the captain of the space ship BRT-34, which has been drifting on the far edge of the milky way due to an engine malfunction for more than 200 years. One day, the cryo tube of the Association of Free Scientists - the destroyed organization that once belonged to albert-materializes next to his ship. Having picked up the cryo tube, the captain receives an order for its delivery.

The game is a mix of a visual novel, a classic quest, and a turn-based RPG. However, if you want, you can disable the RPG component, and enjoy the game as a normal visual novel with quest elements!
